name: WARRIOR FAE - Tribal Carnelian Jasper Statement Necklace Reiki Pagan Amulet
description:
WARRIOR FAE is a tribal amulet necklace that features a jasper focal bead, howlite spikes, ostrich shell spacers, and carnelian beads. My concept was to create ornately beaded necklaces that recall more ancient times when gemstones were worn as amulets of protection, strength and power. WARRIOR FAE showcases rustic design with boldness and glamor. The necklace features three strands of brass and terra cotta beads from Africa, plus brass spacers. The necklace is also made with a dark patina clasp and findings. WARRIOR FAE feels and looks substantial. This stunning statement necklace is one-of-a-kind and would look amazing as ceremonial or ritual wear. 

Necklace measures 20 inches.

CARNELIAN is an agate class of chalcedony that is a stone of creativity, individuality and courage. Like all agates, it has protection energies. It can aid memory, including recall of past lives. It can assist one in finding the right mate. It is also a stone of protection in general and from anger, jealousy and fear. In addition it can help with manifestation of one's desires, and brings good luck. Carnelian can help ease or remove sorrows. It also helps stabilize energies in the home. It is sometimes called the "actor's stone". Carnelian is associated with the root and sacral chakras.

JASPER is called an ornamental rock. It is an opaque and fine grained variety, composed mostly of Chalcedony, microcrystalline Quartz, in association with other minerals, which is what give it those colorful bands and patterns. It is found in almost all colors. The ancient Egyptians wore Jasper scarabs as amulets, as this stone was believed to increase sexual energy. Both Indians in Asia as well as Native Americans, see it as a magical rain stone, and also a powerful healing stone.

name: SORCERESS - Tanzan Aura Quartz Statement Necklace Purple Crystal Artisan Reiki Amulet
description:
SORCERESS is a beautiful statement necklace that features a cascade of Tanzan Aura Quartz points combined with silver lined purple bugle beads. Dramatically accented with two huge iridescent crystal focal beads, SORCERESS includes thoughtful details like African brass spacers, filigree spacers and dark patina findings. A brand new Spinning Castle design, SORCERESS is a dramatic statement necklace that sparkles deep shades of purple and gold. The SORCERESS necklace is a powerful talisman that gleams with gorgeous color and tribal sophistication. It would make a stunning addition to ritual or ceremonial wear. Positively gorgeous!

TANZINE AURA QUARTZ is a beautiful new gemstone of the Indigo/Violet Ray. It covers the same color spectrum as its namesake, Tanzanite, and indeed its radiance of colors is akin to that displayed by the finest Tanzanite gems. Like its cousins, Aqua Aura and Angel Aura Quartz, Tanzan Aura Quartz is created by the pyroelectric bonding of natural clear Quartz with atomized metal compounds. In the case of Tanzan Aura Quartz, the most important compo­nents are Indium, Gold and Niobium, all three of which are powerful substances in their own right. When combined with pure Quartz, which amplifies their power, these elements make for an intense vibrational pattern. Tanzan Aura Quartz is one of the most powerful materials for the development of one's latent psychic abilities and the enhancement of one's conscious connection to Spirit. It is an incredibly potent aid for intuitives of all sorts—mediums, shamans, readers, channelers, healers—as well as those who simply wish to become clearer in their subtle perceptions. It stimu­lates the third eye and crown chakras, blending and unifying their energies. It supports clear think­ing and aids memory. It helps one find inspiration and can evoke experiences of the 'aha' moment. It aids one in discovering novel solutions to long­standing problems by thinking 'outside the box.' Emotionally, Tanzan Aura Quartz allows one to kindle spiritual passion and to transcend states of indifference and boredom. It renews one's zest for the path of mysticism and self-actualization. -Quoted from Robert Simmons & Naisha Ahsian authors of "The Book of Stones"

Necklace measures approximately 37 inches.

name: POSEIDON'S TREASURE - Crystal Wand Agate Fossil Coral Labradorite Blesbok Horn Pagan Reiki Altar
description:
The tip of POSEIDON'S TREASURE features an Agatized Fossil Coral that has druzy crystal formations all over the surface! POSEIDON'S TREASURE is handcrafted by me, Susan Tooker, and made with the best crystals and gemstones that I could find. Blesbok horns are comforting to hold and their pattern is quite dramatic and beautiful. The Blesbok horn wands are larger than the Springbok ones, averaging 14 to 20 inches in length. Adorned with a nautical shell motif, spirals and beautiful blue, orange and AB Swarovski gems, the spirals have an Art Nouveau or Celtic La Tene feel to their design. Centered in the front is a polished Labradorite and Blue Chalcedony cabochon below a gold leafed crescent moon. The sculpting has been antiqued with metallic gold paint and then sealed with clear coat. This crystal wand is part of a series of elaborate wands that feature Blesbok horn handles and also display beaded charm dangles hanging from within the sculpting. The dangles on POSEIDON'S TREASURE are beaded with a genuine Gold Rutile Quartz and a Carnelian bead. The magickal POSEIDON'S TREASURE Wand would be a wonderful addition to a sacred space, reiki healing, Wiccan rital or Pagan altar.

POSEIDON'S TREASURE measures 19 inches from tip to tip.

BLESBOK wisdom Includes: Action, Speed, Adaptability of the Mind. Blesbok teaches survival and how to avoid indiscriminate destruction of life. Nicknamed the sea ears, the Abalone’s flattened, oval shape with iridescent interior was used by the Native Northwest American Indians as a natural vessel for cleansing, offerings and prayers.

name: KEEPER OF SECRETS - Bobcat Skull Shrine Art Reliquary Box Pagan Altar
description:
KEEPER OF SECRETS is handcrafted, one-of-a-kind and the second Altar Box offered in my Spinning Castle shop! KEEPER OF SECRETS was created with a genuine Bobcat skull. The skull features fossil ammonite "eyes," a Rutile Quartz "nose" and a "headdress" made with Buffalo teeth and green Jewel Beetle elytra. The skull is decorated with a leaf motif, sculpted spirals, and is adorned with Swarovski gems, Labradorite, Prehnite, Yellow Tigers Eye, plus a Moonstone cabochon fittingly placed on KEEPER OF SECRETS "third eye." Hand painted with metallic paint by me, the skull and box has also been sealed with a clear coating. The altar box itself is adorned with Swarovski crystals, three Smoky Quartz cabochons, two Yellow Tiger Eye cabochons, four Labradorite cabochons, and a Green Aventurine cabochon in the front. The sculpting includes leaf and spiral motifs. This keepsake box is covered in gemstones. KEEPER OF SECRETS is part altar shrine, part totem protector and all mystery. This is not your everyday box and would look fabulous on a special altar honoring a Bobcat familiar or totem!

LABRADORITE is a considered by mystics to be a stone of transformation and magic. It is said to clear, balance and protect the aura. It is purported to help provide clarity and insight into your destiny, as well as attract success. It is used in metaphysics for dream recall, and finding ways to use dreams in daily life. Mystically, energies of stress and anxiety are said to be reduced by labradorite. Labradorite is said to increase intuition, psychic development, esoteric wisdom, help with subconscious issues, and provide mental illumination.

YELLOW TIGER'S EYE is a stone of protection that is also very grounding. It enhances integrity, willpower, practicality and correct use of power. It is a stone that enhances good luck, and brings prosperity, often in the form of money. Tiger's eye is also a very protective stone which is especially protective during travel. It can also help one see clearly without illusion. Tiger's eye brings a special boost to the solar plexus chakra and to one's personal power.

MOONSTONE is said in crystal healing to help calm responses and avoid overreaction; enhances feminine energies, sensitivity, intuition, and psychic abilities. It is also said to bring strong energies of abundance to one's life. Moonstone is a stone of protection, especially during childbirth, pregnancy, and travel at sea. It is a stone of calm and relief from emotional stress. It is also associated with love of all kinds. Moonstone is associated with the crown and third eye chakras, and sometimes with the heart chakra.

PREHNITE is a very protective stone and can protect one on all levels. It strengthens the life force and generally increases and stimulates energy, while at the same time bringing powerful calming energies. Thus, prehnite is said to ease worries and restlessness of all kinds. It aids spirit communication through meditation or visualization, out-of-body travel, and is a powerful dream stone. Prehnite is also known as a stone of prophesy which stimulates inner-knowing. 

BOBCAT TOTEM is a sign of patience. Bobcats are superior hunters, and they incorporate stealth, strategy and wield a great deal of patience in their hunting excursions. In this way, the Bobcat sends us a clear message that in order for us to get what we want, we must be willing to plan, adapt, and above all, have the patience to see our ideals manifest. When dealing with social settings (friends, family, work) the Bobcat reminds us to be fully aware. We must be mindful to extend our respect, love and consideration with others. As the Bobcat is primarily a solitary creature, we may take its presence as a sign for us to step back from the company of certain people in our lives. Or, the Bobcat may be trying to tell us that we need some time to ourselves. Alone time is time for us to reflect, and regain our energy. The Bobcat intrinsically knows this, and may be trying to tell you to take a break away from the public eye. Bobcat animal totems encourage us to be more playful in our lives and more flexible. As they are very opportunistic themselves, the Bobcat asks us to reach out for more opportunities, break out of our molds & routines. The Bobcat animal totem is also about creation, and developing our abilities into a higher level of value. Additionally, the Bobcat is also about the unseen and silent aspects of our inner selves. Additionally, when Bobcat appears to us, we need to consider some passions that we have been keeping a secret. Now is the time to unleash our hidden desires - unlock our inner secret wisdom & talents.

name: SACRED RAM - Pagan Skull Staff Shaman Totem Magick Walking Stick
description:
The SACRED RAM Staff features a genuine ram skull which has been crowned with a Frosted Quartz Crystal cluster. Two flashing Labradorites occupy the front of the skull, as well as a polished Black Tourmaline and a Carnelian cabochon. Two fossil Ammonites serve as the eyes. Embedded in the ornamentation on the horns are two Black Tourmalines and two Agate cabochons. The horns have also been wrapped with leather and ornamentation. Four dangles hang from the horns that include River Amber, Agate, River Stone, African Stone, Peridot and handmade charms that were gold-leafed. Fox fur covers the back of the skull and a fox tail hangs below. Generously covering the skull and staff handle is ornate sculpting with leaf and spiral motifs. All of the adornment is enhanced with beautiful Khaki Green, Jet Black and Topaz Swarovski gems. Included in the decoration are 12 Carnelian cabochons down the length of the staff. The Celtic spirals and leaf motifs were antiqued with a metallic bronze, copper, and gold paint. Three layers of clear coat was applied.The wood handle is a piece of rustic driftwood gathered from the shore of the great Columbia River in Oregon. I wrapped the handle with buttery soft brown leather for added comfort. 

SACRED RAM is handcrafted by me, Susan Tooker, and is the first of its kind to be offered in my Spinning Castle online shop. I have made several personal staffs and decided to start creating them for my collectors as well. I envisioned this staff as a tribute to the mythic Ram. Inspired by ancient religons, Tibetan skulls, ossuaries, charnel houses and modern archelogical finds, my concept was to create a future artifact of Spirit and Ritual. The SACRED RAM Staff took 7 months to complete and is indicative of the direction that some of my major pieces of artwork will take in the future. 

Suitable for Witch, Druid, Wizard, Shaman or Art Collector, the SACRED RAM Staff is one of the finest items I have created for my Spinning Castle online store thus far. I'm super happy with the result! I will be creating major Altar pieces in the near future, as well as, new wands, fans and other tools.

SACRED RAM measures 59 inches from tip to tip.

I photographed SACRED RAM in the setting in which I gather driftwood for my ritual tools...along the shore of the great Columbia River, Oregon.

name: HATHOR - Buffalo Teeth Tribal Necklace Garnet Carnelian Jet Crystal Pagan Amulet
description:
HATHOR is a super long tribal necklace that features water buffalo teeth combined with large gemstone beads. My concept was to create ornately beaded necklaces that recall more ancient times when gemstones were worn as amulets of protection, strength and power. HATHOR showcases the buffalo teeth with a beautiful Jasper pendant that has wonderful shades of red, gold, white and black. The necklace is accented with beads of Jet, Garnet, Carnelian, and Clear Quartz Crystal. Also included in the design are various brass spacers from Africa. HATHOR feels substantial when worn and is statement necklace that creates a sense of power and protection. 

Necklace measures approximately 43 inches.

JET, though known as black amber, is not amber at all. It is driftwood, primarily of the family Araucariaceae, that has fossilized, metamorphosed to lignite coal. At high magnification, the structure of the wood can still be seen even though its origin as a tree is millions of years in the past. In Whitby, England jet is mined that came from the Jurassic era around 180 million years ago. Jet is a soft, dull stone, but it will take a very high polish, even to a mirror finish. This is one of the things that has made it popular in talismans, jewelry, and carvings for centuries. Queen Victoria In the Victorian era, jet was used extensively for mourning jewelry. It has also been a traditional stone for rosaries.

It can assist one in finding the right mate. It is also a stone of protection in general and from anger, jealousy and fear. BLACK TOURMALINE or Schorl, is considered one of the most potent of all gemstones in that it works as a healing gemstone as well as a cleansing gemstone. A major gemstone of the 1st Chakra, Black Tourmaline is considered one of the most potent gemstones for dispelling negativity and depression while at the same time providing powerful protection. JET, though known as black amber, is not amber at all. It is driftwood, primarily of the family Araucariaceae, that has fossilized, metamorphosed to lignite coal. At high magnification, the structure of the wood can still be seen even though its origin as a tree is millions of years in the past. In Whitby, England jet is mined that came from the Jurassic era around 180 million years ago. Jet is a soft, dull stone, but it will take a very high polish, even to a mirror finish. This is one of the things that has made it popular in talismans, jewelry, and carvings for centuries. Queen Victoria In the Victorian era, jet was used extensively for mourning jewelry. It has also been a traditional stone for rosaries. 

CHRYSOCOLLA is a stone of harmony, both on a universal level and a very specific level. It can be used to purify a place or remove negativity from a person. AURA AGATE is natural agate slabs which have undergone a special infusion process using pure gold, silver, platinum, indium, titanium or copper. This process involves heating the Agate to extremely high temperatures (in excess of 1600°F) then adding the purified metal in a vacuum, which bonds it to the surface. The result is a permanent coating which has been bonded with the Agate at a molecular level. Although the coating is very thin, usually only 1 micron, it cannot be rubbed or scratched off and the results are quite spectacular. Only the best quality Agate is used for Aura coating, with any inferior specimens breaking during the heating and bonding process. Metaphysically, coated or Aura Agate have all of the properties of Agate, but with the additional benefits of the individual metal. Gold, in particular, is considered the master healer, with platinum having the highest vibration for spiritual work.

AGATE is noted in the metaphysical world to be a good protective energy stone, especially for children, and very calming and soothing. It is also said to help strengthen the body's connection to the earth. It is reported to mystically give courage, energy, strength, and dispels fears, all of which increase self-confidence. It is said to lessen feelings of envy by grounding the emotions. Agate is also used in crystal emotional healing for resolving bitterness and resentments. It is also called and believed to be a stone of harmony. These two factors makes it a stone that's said to help improve and harmonize relationships. Also, by bringing the elements of one's being into harmony it greatly enhances healing. Agate also enhances creativity and stimulates the intellect. Agate is considered a stone that brings good luck.

description:
NIMUE is made with absolutely gorgeous Silver Aura Quartz Crystal points that are naturally rough and generously wrapped with gunmetal wire. I complimented the Quartz points with pale teal blue African recycled glass beads, gorgeous iridescent crystal beads, rhinestone beads, and a black patina Deco chain. NIMUE is absolutely loaded with quality beads and will dazzle in the sunlight! A truly substantial bracelet and wrist amulet.

Bracelet measures approximately 8 inches with a 2 inch extender.
This bracelet can be adjusted to fit your wrist! Just write the needed measurement in the note to seller!

AURA QUARTZ is natural Clear Quartz which has undergone a special infusion process using pure gold, silver, platinum, indium, titanium or copper. This process involves heating the Quartz to extremely high temperatures (in excess of 1600°F) then adding the purified metal in a vacuum, which bonds it to the surface. The result is a permanent coating which has been bonded with the crystal at a molecular level. Although the coating is very thin, usually only 1 micron, it cannot be rubbed or scratched off and the results are quite spectacular. Only the best quality Quartz is used for Aura coating, with any inferior specimens breaking during the heating and bonding process. In nature, Quartz can be found with inclusions of all the above metals, but they are often quite rare and therefore tend to be very expensive. Metaphysically, coated or Aura Quartz crystals have all of the properties of Quartz, but with the additional benefits of the individual metal. Gold, in particular, is considered the master healer, with platinum having the highest vibration for spiritual work.

Although the coating is very thin, usually only 1 micron, it cannot be rubbed or scratched off and the results are quite spectacular. Only the best quality Agate is used for Aura coating, with any inferior specimens breaking during the heating and bonding process. Metaphysically, coated or Aura Agate have all of the properties of Agate, but with the additional benefits of the individual metal. Gold, in particular, is considered the master healer, with platinum having the highest vibration for spiritual work.

description:
ELFLAND QUEEN are made with the naturally beautiful Elytra (wings) of the Green Jewel beetle (Sternocera aequisignata.) The elytra shift in color from green to gold. The surface of the elytra are shiny and iridescent, giving the effect of sunlight on oil-slick. Beetle wings have been used for centuries by Indian civilizations, cut into tiny spangle shapes to adorn a range of objects from garments and turban cloths, to canopies and book covers, their reflective properties admired as a means to ward off evil spirits.

The iridescent green gold of the elytra are complimented with gorgeous iridescent faceted crystal beads, oxidized black brass findings, mini flower links and Victorian garden floral connectors.

The wings make a wonderful tinkling sound when worn...like the sound of the faeries! 

BEETLE- "As with many insects the beetle goes through a tremendous metamorphosis from the grub stage to the winged. Because of this, it is associated with resurrection and change. In its winged stage, the front set of wings are thickened into hard covers which fold and protect the soft underside. This may indicate for those with this totem a need to be more protective, or possibly that you are too closed off." ~~Ted Andrews

It would make a stunning addition to ritual or ceremonial wear.

Necklace measures 28 inches.

AURA QUARTZ is natural Clear Quartz which has undergone a special infusion process using pure gold, silver, platinum, indium, titanium or copper. This process involves heating the Quartz to extremely high temperatures (in excess of 1600°F) then adding the purified metal in a vacuum, which bonds it to the surface. The result is a permanent coating which has been bonded with the crystal at a molecular level. Although the coating is very thin, usually only 1 micron, it cannot be rubbed or scratched off and the results are quite spectacular. Only the best quality Quartz is used for Aura coating, with any inferior specimens breaking during the heating and bonding process. In nature, Quartz can be found with inclusions of all the above metals, but they are often quite rare and therefore tend to be very expensive. Metaphysically, coated or Aura Quartz crystals have all of the properties of Quartz, but with the additional benefits of the individual metal. Gold, in particular, is considered the master healer, with platinum having the highest vibration for spiritual work.

name: FREYJA - Gold Aura Quartz Crystal Point Charm Bracelet Rhinstone Iridescent Bead Amulet
description:
FREYJA is designed with absolutely gorgeous Gold Aura Quartz Crystal points that are naturally rough and generously wrapped with gunmetal wire. I complimented the Quartz points with golden African recycled glass beads, gorgeous iridescent crystal beads, rhinestone spacers, and a black patina Deco chain. FREYJA is absolutely loaded with quality beads and will dazzle in the sunlight! A truly substantial bracelet and wrist amulet.

Bracelet measures approximately 8 inches with a 2 inch extender.
This bracelet can be adjusted to fit your wrist. Just write the needed measurement in the note to seller.

AURA QUARTZ is natural Clear Quartz which has undergone a special infusion process using pure gold, silver, platinum, indium, titanium or copper. This process involves heating the Quartz to extremely high temperatures (in excess of 1600°F) then adding the purified metal in a vacuum, which bonds it to the surface. The result is a permanent coating which has been bonded with the crystal at a molecular level. Although the coating is very thin, usually only 1 micron, it cannot be rubbed or scratched off and the results are quite spectacular. Only the best quality Quartz is used for Aura coating, with any inferior specimens breaking during the heating and bonding process. In nature, Quartz can be found with inclusions of all the above metals, but they are often quite rare and therefore tend to be very expensive. Metaphysically, coated or Aura Quartz crystals have all of the properties of Quartz, but with the additional benefits of the individual metal. Gold, in particular, is considered the master healer, with platinum having the highest vibration for spiritual work.

name: DIVINE UNDINE - Jewel Beetle Elytra Wings Earrings Blue Turquoise Green Art Nouveau Dangle
description:
DIVINE UNDINE are made of the naturally beautiful Elytra (wings) of the Jewel beetle (Sternocera aequisignata.) These earrings are made from the very rare blue variation of the Jewel Beetle and are a stunning combination of deep turquoise and ultramarine color. The surface of the elytra are shiny and iridescent, giving the effect of sunlight on oil-slick. Beetle wings have been used for centuries by Indian civilizations, cut into tiny spangle shapes to adorn a range of objects from garments and turban cloths, to canopies and book covers, their reflective properties admired as a means to ward off evil spirits.

The iridescent blue color of the elytra are complimented with gorgeous iridescent faceted crystal beads, oxidized black brass findings, rhinestone spacers, and Victorian filigree connector drops.

The wings make a wonderful tinkling sound when worn...like the sound of the faeries! 

BEETLE- "As with many insects the beetle goes through a tremendous metamorphosis from the grub stage to the winged. Because of this, it is associated with resurrection and change. In its winged stage, the front set of wings are thickened into hard covers which fold and protect the soft underside. This may indicate for those with this totem a need to be more protective, or possibly that you are too closed off." ~~Ted Andrews

Earrings measure 4.75 inches long.

description:
The main power crystal of TALISMAN OF JUPITER features a Brazilian Laser Quartz Crystal that has Black Tourmaline formations inside the tip! TALISMAN OF JUPITER is handcrafted by me, Susan Tooker, and made with the best crystals and gemstones that I could find. Polished Kudu horns are comforting to hold and their coloring is quite dramatic and beautiful. Adorned with an oak leaf motif, spirals and beautiful gold, ruby, brown topaz and green AB Swarovski gems, the spirals have an Art Nouveau or Celtic La Tene feel to their design. Centered in the front is a sparkling Pyrite specimen and a polished Nummite below a gold leafed crescent moon. At the opposite end of the wand handle is a Black Tourmalated Quartz cabochon and a Rainbow Moonstone cabochon. The sculpting has been antiqued with metallic pewter, ruby and gold paint. Three layers of clear coat was then applied. This crystal wand is part of a series of elaborate wands that feature polished Kudu horn handles and also display beaded charm dangles hanging from within the sculpting. The dangles on TALISMAN OF JUPITER are beaded with a genuine Silver Aura Quartz points and Labradorite beads. The magickal TALISMAN OF JUPITER Wand would be a wonderful addition to a sacred space, reiki healing, Wiccan rital or Pagan altar.

TALISMAN OF JUPITER measures 21.5 inches from tip to tip.

ANTELOPE TOTEM teaches survival and how to avoid indiscriminate destruction of life. The Antelope signifies knowledgeable action. Through Antelope you can learn to truly live and action is the key and essence to living. Antelope is the messenger of a higher purpose; he knows the way and through him, so will you. Antelope can teach clairvoyance by listening to his voice inside of you. An Antelope person is intrinsically psychic.

LASER WAND CRYSTAL (lazer wand) is recognized by its long slenderness with small faces at the point, with the crystal being wider at the bottom. Laser Wand crystals (Lazer Wand) are pointers of the crystal world. They focus energy very precisely where they are pointed. This makes them excellent tools for psychic surgery. They are also noted for helping with communication and meditation on other dimensions and worlds.

PYRITE is a stone of intellect and protection. It enhances intelligence, mental stability, logic, analysis, creativity, memory, and psychic development. It can help you tap your own latent mental talents and abilities. Pyrite is a powerful protection stone, and is very grounding. Pyrite is also known as Fool's Gold and Healer's Gold. Pyrite additionally is a stone that brings energies of good luck or good fortune.

NUUMITE is the oldest mineral in the world. Nuumite was formed over three billion (3, 000, 000, 000) years ago. It crystallizes in the form of laminates and when polished, it is black and nearly opaque with sheets of refractive colour. Nuumite is found in an area slightly north of Nuuk, Greenland - accessible only by boat. The area where Nuumite occurs is in the so-called 'Isuakasia' iron ore region, the origin of which dates back almost four billion years. Sometimes called the Magician's or Sorcerer's Stone, Nuumite can be used to open, activate and balance your Chakras. It is a grounding stone and integrates your spiritual awareness into your physical experience. Nuumite can remove energy blockages and it can draw energy from your etheric body to restore energy to your physical body. You can use Nuumite to patch up and clear your aura. It is a powerfully-protective stone and simply having it on your person deflects negativity on all levels.

BLACK TOURMALATED QUARTZ also known as tourmaline in quartz, is an excellent protective stone, and brings balance and inner strength. It deflects and grounds negativity, and reduces anxiety and depression.

MOONSTONE is said in crystal healing to help calm responses and avoid overreaction; enhances feminine energies, sensitivity, intuition, and psychic abilities. It is also said to bring strong energies of abundance to one's life. Moonstone is a stone of protection, especially during childbirth, pregnancy, and travel at sea. It is a stone of calm and relief from emotional stress. It is also associated with love of all kinds. Moonstone is associated with the crown and third eye chakras, and sometimes with the heart chakra.

name: DIVINE UNDINES - Jewel Beetle Elytra Iridescent Wings Earrings Copper Gold Green Chandelier Dangle
description:
DIVINE UNDINES are made with the naturally beautiful Elytra (wings) of the Green Jewel beetle (Sternocera aequisignata.) These earrings features the rare copper mutation of the Jewel beetle. The elytra shift in color from copper to gold to green. The surface of the elytra are shiny and iridescent, giving the effect of sunlight on oil-slick. Beetle wings have been used for centuries by Indian civilizations, cut into tiny spangle shapes to adorn a range of objects from garments and turban cloths, to canopies and book covers, their reflective properties admired as a means to ward off evil spirits.

The iridescent copper of the elytra are complimented with gorgeous iridescent faceted crystal beads, oxidized black brass findings and open filigree hoops. 

The wings make a wonderful tinkling sound when worn...like the sound of the faeries! 

BEETLE- "As with many insects the beetle goes through a tremendous metamorphosis from the grub stage to the winged. Because of this, it is associated with resurrection and change. In its winged stage, the front set of wings are thickened into hard covers which fold and protect the soft underside. This may indicate for those with this totem a need to be more protective, or possibly that you are too closed off." ~~Ted Andrews

Earrings measure 4.5 inches long.

The handle is a piece of rustic driftwood gathered from the shore of the Columbia River, Oregon. The wood grain is richly dark brown and the grip is wonderfully smooth to hold. Adorned with Celtic spirals and leaves that were antiqued with metallic pewter, plum and gold paint, three layers of clear coat was added for protection. Volcano, Blue Capri and AB Swarovski gems were added to give the whole wand a lovely richness. The sculpting has an Art Nouveau or Celtic La Tene feel to its styling. While I was making NIGHTFALL GODDESS, I was thinking of the magical time of nightfall and the lovely colors of dusk.

NIGHTFALL GODDESS measures 23 inches from tip to tip.

name: MERMAID TREASURE - Aquamarine Crystal Wand Moonstone Chalcedony Springbok Horn Magick Pagan Altar
description:
MERMAID TREASURE is handcrafted and made with a single female Springbok horn for its handle. The tip is a beautiful blue Aquamarine Crystal. Below the main power crystal is a silver leafed crescent moon. Adorned with a nautical shell motif, spirals and Swarovski gems, the spirals have an Art Nouveau or Celtic La Tene feel to their design. Centered in the front are polished Moonstone and Blue Chalcedony cabochons. The spirals have been antiqued with turquoise blue, iridescent and pearl metallic paint. A final clear coat was then applied. Hanging from within the sculpting is a 7.5 inch dangle with a Tibetan Quartz Crystal as the main focal bead. MERMAID TREASURE is a lovely wand, larger than my Mini Antler Wands, but more delicate than the male Springbok Horn Wands. The MERMAID TREASURE crystal wand would be a lovely addition to any sacred space, reiki healing ceremony, magickal ritual, Pagan or Wiccan altar. 

SPRINGBOK totem wisdom Includes: ability to sprint, joy of life, exuberance, love of social structure, water conservation abilities

MERMAID TREASURE measures 11 inches from tip to tip, not including the 7.5 inch dangle.

name: ELEMENTAL TRUTH - Lapis Lazuli Silver Aura Quartz Tribal Necklace Antler Fossil Sodalite Pendant
description:
ELEMENTAL TRUTH is an amulet that features a fossil that is a deer antler fragment and a Sodalite specimen. The pendant has been hand sculpted with spirals and adorned with a small Lapis Lazuli cabochon, plus Dark Sapphire Swarovski gems. It was wrapped with black oxidized wire. The pendant hangs from a necklace that includes deep blue Lapis Lazuli, Silver Aura Quartz crystals, genuine Jet, African recycled glass beads, fancy etched jump rings and dark oxidized wire. The combination of chunky gemstones and the dark metal, rustic design is striking. ELEMENTAL TRUTH is a dramatic statement necklace!

Ice Age fossils direct from Florida are the inspiration for a new series of amulets handmade by me, Susan Tooker of Spinning Castle. The fossils serve as the base for a pendant that I combine with crystals, cabochons, sculpting, and Swarovski crystals. Each amulet is truly one-of-a-kind because each these fossils date from the last Ice Age and are over 10,000 years old! The color, texture and feel of the fossils is fascinating. Perfect for those with a deer totem!

Necklace measures 21 inches.
